Package com.iontrading.mkv

Class MkvPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iontrading.mkv.MkvPlatform
  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public class MkvPlatform
extends Object
    This class provides access to ION Platform services and informations exported by this API.

    Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in this class will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.

    See Also:
    Mkv.getPlatform()

      • CheckIdentifier

        public static boolean CheckIdentifier​(String name)
        Checks whether the given string represents a valid component identifier.
        Parameters:
        name - the string to check
        Returns:
        true if the given string represents a valid component identifier, false otherwise.

      • startFlushBlock

        public void startFlushBlock()
        Delimits a block where this API starts collecting all the connections where the current thread is going to queue operations to. To avoid memory leaks, each call to this method should be coupled with a call to endFlushBlock().

      • endFlushBlock

        public void endFlushBlock()
        Flushes all connections which have been collected since startFlushBlock() had been called.

      • endFlushBlock

        public void endFlushBlock​(boolean tcpsynch)
        Flushes all connections which have been collected since
        Parameters:
        tcpsynch - if synchronous send over socket is requested startFlushBlock() had been called.

      • register

        public boolean register()
        Starts the registration process.

        If the registration daemon supports it, the component will attempt to use the secure registration protocol consisting of separate authentication, license acquisition and registration phases.

        Returns:
        true if the registration process has been started, false if the registration process was already running.
        See Also:
        registerOnBehalfOf(String, String, String, String, MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationListener)

      • deleteClient

        public boolean deleteClient​(String component)
        Unregisters a connection request to the specified component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component name.
        Returns:
        false if a request for the specified component does not exist.
        See Also:
        createClient(String, MkvConnectionDir), createClient(String, MkvConnectionDir, MkvConnectionQoS)

      • createClient

        public void createClient​(String component,
                         MkvConnectionDir direction,
                         MkvConnectionQoS qos)
                  throws MkvException
        Registers a connection request with the specified component.

        Tries to create a connection with the specified component.
        This method makes the API responsible for the requested connection and the application will automatically restore the connection whenever it is broken. Each connection is checked every mkv.ctimeout seconds.

        Parameters:
        component - the component name to connect to
        direction - the direction of the connection as defined in MkvConnectionType
        qos - a MkvConnectionQoS configuration object
        Throws:
        MkvException - if a connection request for the specified component already exists.
        See Also:
        createClient(String, MkvConnectionDir), deleteClient(String), MkvConnectionDir, MkvConnectionQoS, MkvProperties.getDefaultConnectionQoS()

      • createClient

        public void createClient​(String component,
                         MkvConnectionDir direction)
                  throws MkvException
        Registers a connection request with the specified component.

        Tries to create a connection with the specified component.
        This method makes the API responsible for the requested connection and the application will automatically restore the connection whenever it is broken. Each connection is checked every mkv.ctimeout seconds.

        Parameters:
        component - the component name to connect to
        direction - the direction of the connection as defined in MkvConnectionType
        Throws:
        MkvException - if a connection request for the specified component already exists, or if the direction parameter is MkvConnectionDir.UNKNOWN.
        See Also:
        createClient(String, MkvConnectionDir, MkvConnectionQoS), deleteClient(String), MkvConnectionDir, MkvConnectionQoS, MkvProperties.getDefaultConnectionQoS()

      • sysMessage

        public void sysMessage​(int level,
                       String message)
                throws MkvException
        Sends a system message to the configuration server. The message is received by all the system administrators.
        Parameters:
        level - the platform event level.
        message - the message.
        Throws:
        MkvException - if a connection to the configuration service is not available.
        See Also:
        SYS_WARNING_code, SYS_MESSAGE_code, SYS_ERROR_code, SYS_FATAL_code

      • createE2EDelaySampler

        public MkvE2EDelaySampler createE2EDelaySampler​(String orig)
                                         throws NullPointerException
        Creates a newly allocated MkvE2EDelaySampler for the specified "virtual" originator, or null if it already exists.

        In case of the "virtual" originator name collides with an existing component name, the behaviour of the returned object is undefined.

        Parameters:
        orig - The "virtual" originator.
        Returns:
        a newly allocated MkvE2EDelaySampler for the specified "virtual" originator, or null if it already exists.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException

      • createE2EDelaySampler

        public MkvE2EDelaySampler createE2EDelaySampler​(String dest,
                                                String orig)
                                         throws NullPointerException
        Creates a newly allocated MkvE2EDelaySampler for the specified "virtual" originator, or null if it already exists.

        In case of the "virtual" originator name collides with an existing component name, the behaviour of the returned object is undefined.

        Parameters:
        dest - The destination component of this E2E, if different from the invoking component.
        orig - The "virtual" originator.
        Returns:
        a newly allocated MkvE2EDelaySampler for the specified "virtual" originator, or null if it already exists.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException

      • getE2EDelaySampler

        public MkvE2EDelaySampler getE2EDelaySampler​(String orig)
                                      throws NullPointerException
        Returns the MkvE2EDelaySampler associated to the specified "virtual" originator, or null if it doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        orig - The "virtual" originator.
        Returns:
        the MkvE2EDelaySampler associated to the specified "virtual" originator, or null if it doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException

      • getE2EDelaySampler

        public MkvE2EDelaySampler getE2EDelaySampler​(String dest,
                                             String orig)
                                      throws NullPointerException
        Returns the MkvE2EDelaySampler associated to the specified "virtual" originator, or null if it doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        dest - The destination component of this E2E, if different from the invoking component.
        orig - The "virtual" originator.
        Returns:
        the MkvE2EDelaySampler associated to the specified "virtual" originator, or null if it doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException

      • authenticateUser

        public boolean authenticateUser​(String user,
                                String password,
                                MkvAuthenticateUserRequestListener lner)
        Performs a user credential authentication onto the Daemon.

        Parameters:
        user - the user to authenticate
        password - the password to authenticate
        lner - the listener to be notified of the request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the request has been sent successfully, false otherwise.

      • authenticateUser

        public boolean authenticateUser​(MkvAuthenticateUserRequest request,
                                MkvAuthenticateUserRequestListener lner)
        Performs a user credential authentication onto the Daemon.

        Parameters:
        request - the request containing the arguments to authenticate the user onto the Daemon
        lner - the listener to be notified of the request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the request has been sent successfully, false otherwise.

      • registerOnBehalfOf

        public boolean registerOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                                  String user,
                                  String password,
                                  String license,
                                  MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationListener lner)
        Deprecated.
        This protocol will disappear in next version. Contact ION Support for further information.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of three steps - authentication, license acquisition and registration; the user provided listener is invoked once: upon failure or successful completion of all of these three phases. On successful completion of the on-behalf-of registration procedure, an authentication token associated with the newly registered component is granted; this latter token is required in order to perform unregister/unlicense of the on-behalf-of registered component.

        Parameters:
        component - the component whose on-behalf-registration is to be requested
        license - the component type for the component to be registered
        user - the user for the component to be registered
        password - the password for the component to be registered
        lner - the listener to be notified of the registration request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the registration process has been started, false if the registration process was already running.
        See Also:
        register(), unregisterOnBehalfOf(String, String), MkvLicenseManager.releaseAuthenticatedLicense(String, String)

      • registerOnBehalfOf

        public boolean registerOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                                  String user,
                                  String password,
                                  String newPassword,
                                  String license,
                                  MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationListener lner)
        Deprecated.
        This protocol will disappear in next version. Contact ION Support for further information.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of three steps - authentication, license acquisition and registration; the user provided listener is invoked once: upon failure or successful completion of all of these three phases. On successful completion of the on-behalf-of registration procedure, an authentication token associated with the newly registered component is granted; this latter token is required in order to perform unregister/unlicense of the on-behalf-of registered component.

        Parameters:
        component - the component whose on-behalf-registration is to be requested
        license - the component type for the component to be registered
        user - the user for the component to be registered
        password - the password for the component to be registered
        newPassword - the new password for the component to be registered; in case newPassord is set to null, no update request for the user password will be sent to the registration daemon
        lner - the listener to be notified of the registration request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the registration process has been started, false if the registration process was already running.
        See Also:
        register(), unregisterOnBehalfOf(String, String), MkvLicenseManager.releaseAuthenticatedLicense(String, String)

      • registerOnBehalfOf

        public boolean registerOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                                  String user,
                                  String password,
                                  String newPassword,
                                  String otp,
                                  String license,
                                  MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationListener lner)
        Deprecated.
        This protocol will disappear in next version. Contact ION Support for further information.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of three steps - authentication, license acquisition and registration; the user provided listener is invoked once: upon failure or successful completion of all of these three phases. On successful completion of the on-behalf-of registration procedure, an authentication token associated with the newly registered component is granted; this latter token is required in order to perform unregister/unlicense of the on-behalf-of registered component.

        Parameters:
        component - the component whose on-behalf-registration is to be requested
        license - the component type for the component to be registered
        user - the user for the component to be registered
        password - the password for the component to be registered
        newPassword - the new password for the component to be registered; in case newPassord is set to null, no update request for the user password will be sent to the registration daemon
        otp - the one-time-password used to authenticate the user
        lner - the listener to be notified of the registration request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the registration process has been started, false if the registration process was already running.
        See Also:
        register(), unregisterOnBehalfOf(String, String), MkvLicenseManager.releaseAuthenticatedLicense(String, String)

      • registerOnBehalfOf

        public boolean registerOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                                  String user,
                                  String password,
                                  String license,
                                  String host,
                                  String hwInfo,
                                  String apiVersion,
                                  String appVersion,
                                  MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationListener lner)
        Deprecated.
        This protocol will disappear in next version. Contact ION Support for further information.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of three steps - authentication, license acquisition and registration; the user provided listener is invoked once: upon failure or successful completion of all of these three phases. On successful completion of the on-behalf-of registration procedure, an authentication token associated with the newly registered component is granted; this latter token is required in order to perform unregister/unlicense of the on-behalf-of registered component.

        Parameters:
        component - the component whose on-behalf-registration is to be requested
        license - the component type for the component to be registered
        user - the user for the component to be registered
        password - the password for the component to be registered
        host - the virtual host for the component to be registered
        hwInfo - the virtual hardware info for the component virtual host
        apiVersion - the version number for the virtual component's API; set to Java API version if null; supported formats for version numbers are as in following examples: "1.2.3", "1.2.3a4", "1.2.3b4", "1.2.3p4"; an optional trailing develop number, such as in "1.2.3p4d5", will be correctly parsed but subsequently discarded; likewise, alpha and beta version information will be discarded
        appVersion - the version number for the virtual component; set to component version if null supported formats for version numbers are as in following examples: "1.2.3", "1.2.3a4", "1.2.3b4", "1.2.3p4"; an optional trailing develop number, such as in "1.2.3p4d5", will be correctly parsed but subsequently discarded; likewise, alpha and beta version information will be discarded
        lner - the listener to be notified of the registration request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the registration process has been started, false if the registration process was already running.
        See Also:
        register(), unregisterOnBehalfOf(String, String), MkvLicenseManager.releaseAuthenticatedLicense(String, String)

      • registerOnBehalfOf

        public boolean registerOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                                  String user,
                                  String password,
                                  String newPassword,
                                  String license,
                                  String host,
                                  String hwInfo,
                                  String apiVersion,
                                  String appVersion,
                                  MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationListener lner)
        Deprecated.
        This protocol will disappear in next version. Contact ION Support for further information.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure, and provides the possibility to update the user password with a new one.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of three steps - authentication, license acquisition and registration; the user provided listener is invoked once: upon failure or successful completion of all of these three phases. On successful completion of the on-behalf-of registration procedure, an authentication token associated with the newly registered component is granted; this latter token is required in order to perform unregister/unlicense of the on-behalf-of registered component.

        Parameters:
        component - the component whose on-behalf-registration is to be requested
        license - the component type for the component to be registered
        user - the user for the component to be registered
        password - the old password for the component to be registered
        newPassword - the new password for the component to be registered; in case newPassord is set to null, no update request for the user password will be sent to the registration daemon
        host - the virtual host for the component to be registered
        hwInfo - the virtual hardware info for the component virtual host
        apiVersion - the version number for the virtual component's API; set to Java API version if null; supported formats for version numbers are as in following examples: "1.2.3", "1.2.3a4", "1.2.3b4", "1.2.3p4"; an optional trailing develop number, such as in "1.2.3p4d5", will be correctly parsed but subsequently discarded; likewise, alpha and beta version information will be discarded
        appVersion - the version number for the virtual component; set to component version if null supported formats for version numbers are as in following examples: "1.2.3", "1.2.3a4", "1.2.3b4", "1.2.3p4"; an optional trailing develop number, such as in "1.2.3p4d5", will be correctly parsed but subsequently discarded; likewise, alpha and beta version information will be discarded
        lner - the listener to be notified of the registration request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the registration process has been started, false if the registration process was already running.
        See Also:
        register(), unregisterOnBehalfOf(String, String), MkvLicenseManager.releaseAuthenticatedLicense(String, String)

      • registerOnBehalfOf

        public boolean registerOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                                  String user,
                                  String password,
                                  String newPassword,
                                  String otp,
                                  String license,
                                  String host,
                                  String hwInfo,
                                  String apiVersion,
                                  String appVersion,
                                  MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationListener lner)
        Deprecated.
        This protocol will disappear in next version. Contact ION Support for further information.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure, and provides the possibility to update the user password with a new one.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of three steps - authentication, license acquisition and registration; the user provided listener is invoked once: upon failure or successful completion of all of these three phases.         Parameters:
        component - the component whose on-behalf-registration is to be requested
        license - the component type for the component to be registered
        user - the user for the component to be registered
        password - the old password for the component to be registered
        newPassword - the new password for the component to be registered; in case newPassord is set to null, no update request for the user password will be sent to the registration daemon
        otp - the one-time-password used to authenticate the user
        host - the virtual host for the component to be registered
        hwInfo - the virtual hardware info for the component virtual host
        apiVersion - the version number for the virtual component's API; set to Java API version if null; supported formats for version numbers are as in following examples: "1.2.3", "1.2.3a4", "1.2.3b4", "1.2.3p4"; an optional trailing develop number, such as in "1.2.3p4d5", will be correctly parsed but subsequently discarded; likewise, alpha and beta version information will be discarded
        appVersion - the version number for the virtual component; set to component version if null supported formats for version numbers are as in following examples: "1.2.3", "1.2.3a4", "1.2.3b4", "1.2.3p4"; an optional trailing develop number, such as in "1.2.3p4d5", will be correctly parsed but subsequently discarded; likewise, alpha and beta version information will be discarded
        lner - the listener to be notified of the registration request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the registration process has been started, false if the registration process was already running.
        See Also:
        register(), unregisterOnBehalfOf(String, String), MkvLicenseManager.releaseAuthenticatedLicense(String, String)

      • registerOnBehalfOfUsingPassword

        @Deprecated
public void registerOnBehalfOfUsingPassword​(String username,
                                            String password,
                                            String newPassword,
                                            String otp,
                                            String compType,
                                            String host,
                                            String hwInfo,
                                            MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseListener authenticationListener)
        Deprecated.
        Use registerOnBehalfOfUsingPassword(MkvOnBehalfOfPasswordAuthenticationRequest, MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseListener); MkvOnBehalfOfPasswordAuthenticationRequest object can be built using MkvOnBehalfOfPasswordAuthenticationRequestBuilder.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of two steps:

        Authentication
        The provided credentials are verified by the daemon:
        • in case of successful authentication, the MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseListener#onAuthenticationSuccess(MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseEvent, MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationFinalizer) method is invoked providing the username and the MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationFinalizer object to proceed with the second step;
        • in case of unsuccessful authentication, the MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseListener#onAuthenticationFailure(MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationResult, String) method is invoked providing the authentication result and the optional custom error message.
        Registration
        The on-behalf-of component will be registered on the platform.
        In case of successful registration a token associated with the newly registered component is returned; this latter token is required in order to perform unregistration and unlicensing of the on-behalf-of registered component.

        Parameters:
        username - The username used to authenticate the of the on-behalf-of component.
        password - The password used to authenticate the of the on-behalf-of component.
        newPassword - Optional new password to be updated when authenticate the of the on-behalf-of component.
        otp - An optional one time password used for authentication.
        compType - The component type of the on-behalf-of component.
        host - The host of the on-behalf-of component.
        hwInfo - The hardware info of the on-behalf-of component.
        authenticationListener - The listener used to be notified about authentication result.

      • registerOnBehalfOfUsingPassword

        @Deprecated
public void registerOnBehalfOfUsingPassword​(String username,
                                            String password,
                                            String newPassword,
                                            String otp,
                                            String compType,
                                            String host,
                                            String hwInfo,
                                            String extraParameters,
                                            MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseListener authenticationListener)
        Deprecated.
        Use registerOnBehalfOfUsingPassword(MkvOnBehalfOfPasswordAuthenticationRequest, MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseListener); MkvOnBehalfOfPasswordAuthenticationRequest object can be built using MkvOnBehalfOfPasswordAuthenticationRequestBuilder.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of two steps:

        Authentication
        The provided credentials are verified by the daemon:
        • in case of successful authentication, the MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseListener#onAuthenticationSuccess(MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseEvent, MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationFinalizer) method is invoked providing the username and the MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationFinalizer object to proceed with the second step;
        • in case of unsuccessful authentication, the MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithPasswordResponseListener#onAuthenticationFailure(MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationResult, String) method is invoked providing the authentication result and the optional custom error message.
        Registration
        The on-behalf-of component will be registered on the platform.
        In case of successful registration a token associated with the newly registered component is returned; this latter token is required in order to perform unregistration and unlicensing of the on-behalf-of registered component.

        Parameters:
        username - The username used to authenticate the of the on-behalf-of component.
        password - The password used to authenticate the of the on-behalf-of component.
        newPassword - Optional new password to be updated when authenticate the of the on-behalf-of component.
        otp - An optional one time password used for authentication.
        compType - The component type of the on-behalf-of component.
        host - The host of the on-behalf-of component.
        hwInfo - The hardware info of the on-behalf-of component.
        extraParameters - A JSON object of additional application parameters passed to the external authenticator. Parameters keys starting with com.iontrading.authentication are reserved.
        authenticationListener - The listener used to be notified about authentication result.

      • registerOnBehalfOfWithAuthenticationToken

        @Deprecated
public void registerOnBehalfOfWithAuthenticationToken​(String serviceId,
                                                      String tokenEncoding,
                                                      String tokenValue,
                                                      String otp,
                                                      String compType,
                                                      String host,
                                                      String hwInfo,
                                                      String extraParameters,
                                                      MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithTokenResponseListener authenticationListener)
        Deprecated.
        Use registerOnBehalfOfWithAuthenticationToken(MkvOnBehalfOfTokenAuthenticationRequest, MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithTokenResponseListener); MkvOnBehalfOfTokenAuthenticationRequest object can be built using MkvOnBehalfOfTokenAuthenticationRequestBuilder.
        Starts the on-behalf-of registration procedure.

        The on-behalf-of registration procedure consists of two steps:

        Authentication
        The provided credentials are verified by the daemon:
        • in case of successful authentication, the MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithTokenResponseListener#onAuthenticationSuccess(MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithTokenResponseEvent, MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationFinalizer) method is invoked providing the username and the MkvOnBehalfOfRegistrationFinalizer object to proceed with the second step;
        • in case of unsuccessful authentication, the MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationWithTokenResponseListener#onAuthenticationFailure(MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationResult, String) method is invoked providing the authentication result and the optional custom error message.
        Registration
        The on-behalf-of component will be registered on the platform.
        In case of successful registration a token associated with the newly registered component is returned; this latter token is required in order to perform unregistration and unlicensing of the on-behalf-of registered component.

        Parameters:
        serviceId - The service id
        tokenEncoding - The encoding of the tokenValue (e.g. Base64 or Plain).
        tokenValue - The credential token to be validated by the daemon.
        otp - An optional one time password used for authentication.
        compType - The component type of the on-behalf-of component.
        host - The host of the on-behalf-of component.
        hwInfo - The hardware info of the on-behalf-of component.
        extraParameters - A JSON object of additional application parameters passed to the external authenticator. Parameters keys starting with com.iontrading.authentication are reserved.
        authenticationListener - The listener used to be notified about authentication result.

      • changePasswordOnBehalfOf

        public boolean changePasswordOnBehalfOf​(String user,
                                        String oldPassword,
                                        String newPassword,
                                        MkvOnBehalfOfGenericRequestListener lner)
        Changes the credential of a user login, on-behalf-of another component.

        Parameters:
        user - the user to change password for
        oldPassword - the old password for the user account
        newPassword - the new password for the user account
        lner - the listener to be notified of the request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the request has been sent successfully, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        genericRequestOnBehalfOf(String, Map, MkvOnBehalfOfGenericRequestListener)

      • changePasswordOnBehalfOf

        public boolean changePasswordOnBehalfOf​(String user,
                                        String oldPassword,
                                        String newPassword,
                                        String component,
                                        String license,
                                        String host,
                                        MkvOnBehalfOfGenericRequestListener lner)
        Changes the credential of a user login, on-behalf-of another component.

        Parameters:
        user - the user to change password for
        oldPassword - the old password for the user account
        newPassword - the new password for the user account
        component - the component whose on-behalf-password change is to be requested
        license - the component license
        host - the virtual host for the component associated to this request
        lner - the listener to be notified of the request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the request has been sent successfully, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        genericRequestOnBehalfOf(String, Map, MkvOnBehalfOfGenericRequestListener)

      • changePasswordOnBehalfOf

        public boolean changePasswordOnBehalfOf​(String user,
                                        String oldPassword,
                                        String newPassword,
                                        String otp,
                                        String component,
                                        String license,
                                        String host,
                                        MkvOnBehalfOfGenericRequestListener lner)
        Changes the credential of a user login, on-behalf-of another component.

        Parameters:
        user - the user to change password for
        oldPassword - the old password for the user account
        newPassword - the new password for the user account
        otp - the one-time-password used to authenticate the user
        component - the component whose on-behalf-password change is to be requested
        license - the component license
        host - the virtual host for the component associated to this request
        lner - the listener to be notified of the request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the request has been sent successfully, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        genericRequestOnBehalfOf(String, Map, MkvOnBehalfOfGenericRequestListener)

      • genericRequestOnBehalfOf

        public boolean genericRequestOnBehalfOf​(String action,
                                        Map<String,​String> parameters,
                                        MkvOnBehalfOfGenericRequestListener lner)
        Sends a generic user authentication request to the Daemon.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be executed onto the Daemon. Example:
        • AuthenticateUsingPassword: to authenticate a user with standard credentials
        • AuthenticateUsingOTP: to authenticate a user via One-Time-Password
        • ChangePassword: to request a password change
        parameters - the set of parameters to be included in the request
        lner - the listener to be notified of the request outcome
        Returns:
        true if the request has been sent successfully, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        genericRequestOnBehalfOf(String, Map, MkvOnBehalfOfGenericRequestListener)

      • getRegistrationToken

        public String getRegistrationToken()
        Retrieves the registration token for this component

        On successful authentication against a daemon implementing the authentication protocol, an authorization token is granted; the component can use this token to register other components on its behalf

        Returns:
        empty string if the component is not registered or registered against a daemon not supporting the authentication protocol

      • unregisterOnBehalfOf

        public boolean unregisterOnBehalfOf​(String component,
                                    String token)
        Deprecated.
        This protocol will disappear in next version. Contact ION Support for further information.
        Unregisters a previously registered-on-behalf-of component

        Parameters:
        component - the component name
        token - the token associated with the component by the on behalf of registration procedure
        Returns:
        false if operation can't be carried on

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected​(String component)

      • setGenericAuditAvailabilityListener

        public void setGenericAuditAvailabilityListener​(MkvGenericAuditAvailabilityListener lner)

      • logGenericAuditEvent

        public boolean logGenericAuditEvent​(MkvGenericAuditEvent evt,
                                    MkvGenericAuditListener lner)
                             throws MkvException
        Sends a Generic Audit Event to the Audit Server.
        Parameters:
        evt - The Generic Audit Event to be logged.
        lner - A MkvGenericAuditListener instance on which the Api can notify about the operation's outcome.
        Returns:
        True if the call to the Audit Server succeeds, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If either the Audit Event or the MkvGenericAuditListener is null.
        MkvException - If the Audit Event contains invalid data.

      • getClientIdentifier

        public int getClientIdentifier()
        Returns the client identifier associated with the ION Platform currently registered to. This identifier is specified in the Daemon Master license file (key.init). The identifier can be -1 in case: - the component has never been registered to any ION Platform, yet - the component is registered to a Daemon instance that does not support unique platform identifier.
        Returns:
        the user identifier of the ION Platform currently registered to

      • getPlatformIdentifier

        public int getPlatformIdentifier()
        Returns the unique identifier of the ION Platform currently registered to. This identifier is specified in the Daemon Master license file (key.init). The unique identifier can be -1 in case: - the component has never been registered to any ION Platform, yet - the component is registered to a Daemon instance that does not support unique platform identifier.
        Returns:
        the unique identifier of the ION Platform currently registered to

      • getRegistrationDaemonName

        public String getRegistrationDaemonName()
        Returns the name of the current registration Daemon instance. The unique identifier string can be "unknown" in case: - the component has never been registered to any ION Platform, yet - the component is registered to a Daemon instance that does not support name propagation at registration time.
        Returns:
        the name of the current registration Daemon instance

      • createAuthenticationRequest

        @Deprecated
public boolean createAuthenticationRequest​(String replyURL,
                                           String context,
                                           String serviceId,
                                           String extraParameters,
                                           MkvAuthenticationRequestCreationListener listener)
        Deprecated.
        Use createAuthenticationRequest(MkvOnBehalfOfCreateAuthenticationRequest, MkvAuthenticationRequestCreationListener)
        Request the creation of an authentication session with the Daemon (for SAML / OpenID).
        Parameters:
        replyURL - the desired reply URL
        context - the desired context
        serviceId - the enterprise authenticator service id
        extraParameters - an optional set of parameters, in Json format, to customize the session
        listener - the application listener that will be notified on completion
        Returns:
        true on success (if registered to a Daemon supporting the feature), false otherwise
        See Also:
        MkvAuthenticationRequestCreationListener, MkvAuthenticationRequestCreationResult, MkvAuthenticationRequestInfo

      • createAuthenticationRequest

        @Deprecated
public boolean createAuthenticationRequest​(String replyURL,
                                           String context,
                                           String serviceId,
                                           String compType,
                                           String host,
                                           String hwInfo,
                                           String extraParameters,
                                           MkvAuthenticationRequestCreationListener listener)
        Deprecated.
        Use createAuthenticationRequest(MkvOnBehalfOfCreateAuthenticationRequest, MkvAuthenticationRequestCreationListener)
        Request the creation of an authentication session with the Daemon (for SAML / OpenID).
        Parameters:
        replyURL - the desired reply URL
        context - the desired context
        serviceId - the external authenticator service id
        compType - the component type requesting this request
        host - the host name where the requesting component is running
        hwInfo - the hardware information associated to the host where the requesting component is running
        extraParameters - an optional set of parameters, in JSON format, to customize the request
        listener - the application listener that will be notified on completion
        Returns:
        true on success (if registered to a Daemon supporting the feature), false otherwise
        See Also:
        MkvAuthenticationRequestCreationListener, MkvAuthenticationRequestCreationResult, MkvAuthenticationRequestInfo

      • createAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequest

        @Deprecated
public boolean createAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequest​(String serviceId,
                                                       String context,
                                                       String replyURL,
                                                       String compType,
                                                       String host,
                                                       String externalUserId,
                                                       String externalSessionReference,
                                                       String extraParameters,
                                                       MkvAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequestCreationListener listener)
        Deprecated.
        Use createAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequest(MkvOnBehalfOfAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequest, MkvAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequestCreationListener).
        Request the creation of an authentication single logout request.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the external authenticator service id
        context - the desired context
        replyURL - the desired reply URL
        compType - the component type requesting this single logout request
        host - the host name where the requesting component is running
        externalUserId - IDP identifier for the user to logout
        externalSessionReference - IDP reference to the session to logout
        extraParameters - an optional set of parameters, in JSON format, to customize the request
        listener - the application listener that will be notified on completion
        Returns:
        true if the request has been routed on the platform; false otherwise. An event is also raised on the application listener if the request is not routed on the Platform.
        See Also:
        MkvAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequestCreationListener, MkvAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequestCreationResult, MkvAuthenticationSingleLogoutRequestInfo
